returns.status: The status of the proposal (Open or Closed).

addProposal(string).notice: This function adds a new proposal to the list of proposals.

closeProposal(uint256).notice: This function allows the admin to close a proposal.

getProposal(uint256).notice: This function returns the details of a proposal.

vote(uint256,uint8).notice: This function allows Safe NFT owners to vote on a proposal.
